I mostly only ever play when I'm with my friends and we do SWF. I've played killer a few times and I'm not really into it because I'm more of a cooperative player, but I mean, this game is fun. The more you get into it though, the more you find to hate and get frustrated at. People more qualified than me will tell you everything BHVR needs to look at to really improve their player's experience. Personally? The best way to have fun with this right now, as long as their isnt like, a different casual mode and ranked mode? Try not to let yourself take the game too seriously. Because this game can spawn a lot of fun times just as much as it can create toxic ones.

As long as BHVR won't fix the frkn issues this game has, i won't give a positive feedback... This game is absolute shit when it comes to balanced and fun gameplay... in 90% of the rounds the killer decides how the game goes... You only get matched with absolute retards and thanks to mmr you also get fucked just because the killer decided to tunnel you for 4 minutes straight and then just camps you on your first hook and you die because non of your "Teammates" comes to your help. Its nearly impossible to play this game without 3 core perks that are "borrowed time", "decesive strike" and "dead hard" otherwise you just get immediatly fucked by the killer... As Killer you just get fucked because you only find swf groups that play like their life depends on it and finishes 3-4 gens in the first 3 minutes of the game... The best perks are locked behind a giant payment wall since you cant unlock every character in the game without paying or get extremly lucky (4 perks rotate per week in a pool of around 191 perks, good luck getting the specific 2 or 3 perks you want) or many, many, many nerv wrecking hours of grinding since it costs an abnormal amount of ingame currency to unlock just 1 character... Its a lot of fun to play this game, when you are already mentaly instable and think about ending your life because it'll fkn help to find a reason to kill yourself thanks to the already super toxic "behaviour" of close to 90% of all players out there, nothing can make your day more then logging in and getting the message that some Arsehole you reported got banned... Honestly, just play another game or play VHS (when its released) if you want something in the same genre as DBD.

Got back into the game after a while and to my surprise there are so many perks for the killer to expose the survivors not as fun as it use to be back when stealth was a thing.

Still having the same issues since 2016. Connection issues and can't play with friends, can't even get one single game to work or function properly. Encountered too many issues to join a single game, nothing worked. I would also like to mention the absolutely horrid customer service, a absolute joke. Some automated platform with extremely limited help. I surfed the forums to look for help with the issues I found in game, just to see most of them are on going since 2016 the release. I wish the Dev's gave a shit to fix bugs that have been ongoing for now six years. Really hope that changes, the game looks fun and promising, if only it worked. But I guess that's what you get when you get a cheap game on sale slashed to a fraction of the previous price with the appeal of a horror game when it's just a pathetic cash grab based on other's content and ideas. Finally was able to get a match, finally, just to watch in awe as the killer wall hack and auto target. I'm surprised they have no anti-cheating, or well not a budget fiverr bootleg one. Hiding, running, hunched over in a corner. Didn't matter, it is very clear they don't care as long as they have their money.
